scripts.postinstall: if [ "$(uname)" = "Linux" ]; then curl -L -f https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o yt-dlp-linux && chmod +x yt-dlp-linux; else curl -L -f https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp_macos -o yt-dlp-macos && chmod +x yt-dlp-macos; fi
scripts.prebuild: set -e; if [ "Darwin" = "Linux" ]; then BIN=yt-dlp-linux; URL=https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp; else BIN=yt-dlp-macos; URL=https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp_macos; fi; echo Fetching ...; curl -L -f "" -o "" && chmod +x "" && mkdir -p src/app/api/download && cp "" src/app/api/download/
